name: Dead Game
description:
!!!This is a mobile game, it's just too easy to aim with a mouse in 2D, you can play on a PC with handicap though(aiming is weird)!!!

Select your medieval warrior, hop into the portal and get ready to gunfight.

Precision matters: Guns deal 100% damage only if you hit the targets right in the middle of their bodies.

Main Menu stuff:
Tap left corner of the screen to change your skin color (go wild please)
Tap on your name to change name (you'll understand how when you tap)
Tap on the badly drawn armory icon to select your gun skins (proof of concept)
Tap anywhere near characters to select one (goes into the summoning circle)
Tap on the big portals to join a room (currently only PvP room)

Controls: 
Touch and hold left side of the screen to move
Touch and hold right side of the screen to attack
Tap right side of the screen to dash
Touch a gun while not firing nor aiming to pick it up (right hand off)
Tap on gun icon to toggle between firing modes (saves preferences per gun)
Tap on info text to dismiss (tap the same place to bring them back)
Tap on character portrait to see settings (tap again to dismiss)

Firing Modes:
Auto: Gun will shoot the moment aim controller is outside of its deadzone
Single: Gun will shoot when touch is released

Settings:
Sound button: (Un)mutes kill announcer and gun sounds
Sensitivity Button: Adjusts the deadzone of the aim controller (aim/shoot)

PC Debug controls:
WASD to move, Space to dash. If you wanna aim, you gotta use the same as mobile
